Public NotInheritable Class CorrelationAliasAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CorrelationAliasAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 当必须从由 指示的参数以外的参数获取相关值时，重写相关参数值。

span.span: Overrides the correlation parameter value when the correlation value must be obtained from a parameter other than that indicated by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 为了使传入的消息与相应的工作流实例相匹配，消息和工作流实例必须共享一个键。To match an incoming message with the appropriate workflow instance, the message and the workflow instance must share a key. 此键称为相关集。This key is called a correlation set. 通常，该键可以是单值相关集。Typically, the key can be a single-valued correlation set. 这意味着消息中的某个 ID 字段可以与计划实例中包含的同一类型的某一 ID 相匹配。This means that an ID field in the message can be matched against an ID of the same type that is held by schedule instances. 应用于数据交换接口中某一接口上的方法或事件。The is applied to a method or an event on an interface on a data exchange interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来重写 。The following code example shows how to use a to override a . 此代码示例摘自“CorrelatedLocalService”SDK 示例。This code example is from the CorrelatedLocalService SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联本地服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#312](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets38.cs#312)]
